lexUnit.name: float.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: move slowly or hover in a liquid or the air

sentence.text: Bodies often float to the surface , but you of all people must know that those who drown in the Thames can disappear altogether and are probably taken by undercurrents down through London and out to sea . "
